title: Best of The Herd: 07/01/2019
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 07/01/2019
description:
Colin points our the Los Angeles Lakers have the best pitch to Kawhi Leonard but they are going to be in real trouble if they don't land him. He is still not buying the Brooklyn Nets even with Kyrie Irving and Kevin Durant. He admits where he was right and wrong over the weekend. Plus, Charles Barkley tells Colin what he would do if he was Kawhi, why playing with friends never mattered to his generation and why teams building solely through free agency are making a mistake.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
